title: Y Combinator Companies Scraper
description: Scrape companies from Y Combinator directory. Provide url or scrape_all_companies.

url.title: Start URL
url.description: URL to scrape companies from, e.g., https://www.ycombinator.com/companies?batch=Summer%202025

scrape_all_companies.title: Scrape all companies
scrape_all_companies.description: If true, scrape all companies from the directory. If false, use the provided URL.

scrape_founders.title: Scrape founders
scrape_founders.description: If true, scrape founders for each company.

scrape_open_jobs.title: Scrape open jobs
scrape_open_jobs.description: If true, scrape open jobs for each company.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of companies
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of companies to collect. Leave empty to collect all available companies.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy (datacenter recommended for Y Combinator).
